column1: Eyes, ears, throat, and mouth: - Burning in mouth Lungs and airways: - Breathing problems (rapid, slow, or painful) - Cough - Shallow breathing Nervous system: - Changes in alertness - Headache - Slurred speech - Weakness Skin: - Yellow skin (jaundice) Stomach and intestines: - Abdominal pain - Diarrhea - Nausea - Vomiting
